title: Loading and reformatting of metabolomics data — preprocessing
code: preprocessing(   fileName,   dataSet = NULL,   names = c("gender", "treatment", "replicate") )

title: Loading and reformatting of metabolomics data — preprocessing
text: fileName name .csv file containing metabolomics data (including path file, needed). dataSet raw data set, already loaded R. names vector strings (default = c("gender", "treatment", "replicate")) specifying names attribute columns.
